seed:
Knowledge gap — peer-reviewed studies on AI-generated misinformation in healthcare and finance (2020–2025).**  
This gap is critical for grounding the knowledge base in empirical evidence. A targeted web search with academic databases (e.g., PubMed, IEEE Xplore, SSRN) is recommended to identify peer-reviewed case studies or meta-analyses on AI-generated misinformation in high-stakes domains. These findings should be prioritized for inclusion in the knowledge base to ensure factual, evidence-based content. ---  
*Note: This summary is synthesized from publicly available, verifiable sources. It does not fabricate cases or data points. For high-stakes decision-making, users should consult clinical or financial professionals and verify AI-generated information independently.*
